scripts.dev: set NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 && concurrently --names "CLIENT  ,WATCH   " --prefix "{name}|" --prefix-colors "magenta,cyan" -k "npm run dev:client" "npm run watch:pages"
scripts.build: node scripts/update-sitemap.js && vite build && npm run build:pages && cp dist/home.html dist/index.html
scripts.watch:pages: concurrently --names "cameo,guillotine,home,invalid,meeting,pretend,sisyphus,wrongest,stats" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "yellow,red,green,blue,magenta,cyan,white,gray,brightBlue" -k "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/cameo/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js cameo" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/guillotine/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js guillotine" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/home/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js index" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/invalid/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js invalid" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/meeting/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js meeting" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/pretend/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js pretend" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/sisyphus/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js sisyphus" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/wrongest/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js wrongest" "nodemon --quiet -w src/views/stats/Page.pug -x node build-pages.js stats"
